00001 <h2>Get rid of duplicates in a snap</h2>
00002 <p class="centered">
00003         <a href="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/singular-screenshot-realsize.png">
00004                 <img id="screenshot" style="margin: 10px" src="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/singular-screenshot.png"
00005                         alt="Singular &mdash; Main Window" /></a>
00006         <!--
00007         <img src="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/singular-big.png"
00008                 alt="Singular" />
00009         -->
00010 </p>
00011 <p>
00012         Singular helps you to find and remove duplicate files on your Mac. Drop files
00013         &amp; folders on its window or its Dock icon, choose files with the open panel,
00014         it makes no difference: it finds duplicate files, shows you the results and
00015         lets you move them to the Trash just in a click of the mouse.
00016 </p>
00017 
00018 <h3>Features</h3>
00019 <p id="feature-clean">
00020         Singular can help you to find duplicate files on a given set of files and folders using
00021         four different criteria: MD5 hash, SHA-1 hash, file size and file name.
00022 </p>
00023 <p id="feature-advanced">
00024         For the power user, Singular has a bunch of advanced settings to customize the way it
00025         scans for duplicates.
00026 </p>
00027 <p id="feature-rescue">
00028         Singular by default keeps a copy for each duplicate file. That way you can safely delete
00029         all the other copies.
00030         And what if you change your mind? Singular keeps a log of what it had moved to the Trash
00031         and its original location.
00032 </p>
00033 <p id="feature-quickscans">
00034         Do you always scan the same folders in search of duplicates? You will love Quick Scans.
00035         Group folders in a Quick Scan and launch it with a single keystroke!
00036 </p>
00037 <p id="feature-swupdate">
00038         Singular uses <a href="http://sparkle.andymatuschak.org" class="external">Sparkle</a>
00039         to handle automatic software updates.
00040         Never worry to check for updates anymore!
00041 </p>
00042 <p id="feature-widget">
00043         Singular comes with a nifty widget that lets you drop files and folders from the Dashboard.
00044 </p>
00045
